query: ALTER TABLE deployment_config_mounts ADD CONSTRAINT deployment_config_mounts_chk_path_valid CHECK(path ~ '^[a-zA-Z0-9_\-\.\(\)]+$'), ADD CONSTRAINT deployment_config_mounts_fk_deployment_id FOREIGN KEY(deployment_id) REFERENCES deployment(id), ADD CONSTRAINT deployment_config_mounts_pk PRIMARY KEY( deployment_id, path );
